testsuite.name: com.ae.qa.testcases.PluginAssignmentsPageTest
testsuite.system-out: User log in Successfully Tenant created successfully Below validation is to validate new tenant record is visible in webtable New Tenant is present in the table-Validated successfully Tenant is created successfully, now assign specific plugin to that tenant User log in Successfully Plugin assigned to single tenant
User log in Successfully Single plugin assigned to desired tenant

User log in Successfully Plugins Tab is selected New Plugin button clicked Single Plugin Jar started uploading Single plugin jar uploaded successfully New plugin jar is uploaded now we will assign it to all tenants User log in Successfully Plugin assigned to all tenant successfully
User log in Successfully Actual page title displayed on screen is: Plugin Assignments and Expected page title is: Plugin Assignments Respective Page is clicked and appropriate page is loaded properly

User log in Successfully Plugins Tab is selected New Plugin button clicked Single Plugin Jar started uploading Single plugin jar uploaded successfully User logged in successfully Workflows Tab is clicked Import button clicked Is Assisted Workflow checkbox is unselected Create Button is clicked Priority is set Expected Completion Time in Seconds is set Maximum Completion Time in Seconds is set Cleanup Requests older than Hours fields is set Manual Execution Time is set Manual Execution time unit is set Save button is clicked Workflow updated Workflow is enabled successfully User log in Successfully Plugin Tab is Selected Plugin Assignment tab is Selected Save Button is Clicked User logged in successfully Workflows Tab is clicked HexColor of WF Slider:-#ced4da
User logged in successfully Workflows Tab is clicked Plugin permission is removed so workflow cannot be made inactive
User log in Successfully Plugin Tab is Selected Plugin Assignment tab is Selected Save Button is Clicked User logged in successfully Workflows Tab is clicked HexColor of WF Slider:-#4492d6
